bikes.name: G1 Cargo E-Cycle
bikes.description: The G1 isn’t just an e-cycle—it’s a powerhouse of durability and performance, designed to handle heavy loads and long rides with ease. Its high-tensile longtail steel frame supports up to 150 kg, while its dual 48V 10.2Ah removable batteries provide an impressive range of up to 100 km on the pedal assist. Powered by a 250W rear hub motor and equipped with 24"x3.0" front and 20"x3.0" rear tyres for superior stability, the Cargo G1 delivers smooth, safe rides across any terrain. With features like 80mm front suspension, 180mm mechanical disc brakes, and a multifunctional display, it’s built for practicality, reliability, and everyday adventures.

specs.Brakes: 180mm Mechanical Disc Brakes with Auto Cut-off
specs.Gears: Single Speed Freewheel with Chain Tensioner
specs.Range: Upto 100 KM on PAS | Upto 75 Km on Throttle

bikes.card_description: Heavy-duty e-cycle with up to 100 km range, dual batteries, 250W motor & 150 kg total load capacity

bikes.name: Doodle Pro
bikes.description: The Doodle Pro isn’t just an e-bike—it’s your gateway to endless adventure. With its foldable design, powerful 36V motor, and a range of up to 60 km on PAS, it’s built to take you further, faster. Equipped with 7-speed Shimano gears, front suspension, and bright front and rear lights, it's compact, easy-to-carry frame makes travelling a breeze. Unfold freedom and ride the future.

specs.Brakes: Mechanical Disc Brakes with Auto Cut-off
specs.Light: Front and Rear Light with Integrated horn
specs.Range: Upto 60 KM on PAS & Upto 45 KM on Throttle
specs.Handlebar: Height Adjustable Handelbar with Foldable stem

bikes.card_description: Experience ultimate mobility with Doodle Pro – India's favourite foldable e-cycle, built for every journey!

bikes.name: T-Rex Pro
bikes.description: T-Rex Pro is the perfect blend of innovation and performance, featuring a first-of-its-kind integrated handlebar display, a durable aluminium alloy frame, and a powerful 13Ah battery. With advanced features like front suspension, integrated front and rear lights, indicators, hazard lights, and ambiance lighting, the T-Rex Pro ensures a smooth, safe, and enjoyable ride across all terrains.

specs.Brakes: Mechanical disc brakes with auto cut-off
specs.Front Light: Handlebar Integrated Lights with high and low beam options
specs.Taillight: Rear light with Inbuilt Indicator and Brake light option
specs.Handlebar Features: Inbuilt Horn, Flashlight, Inbuilt Headlight with High beam and low beam options, Integrated Display, Ambient light option and Indicators

bikes.card_description: World's first ever e-bike with integrated handlebar console!

bikes.name: Lil E
bikes.description: Lil E is an incredibly peppy thing with the oomph to get you from one place to the next, even up inclines. Oh, and it folds up into a tiny footprint!

specs.Range: Up to 15 Km | Up to 20 Km

bikes.card_description: Tiny but terrific, this e-scooter is all the boost you need to kick off all great adventures.

bikes.name: T-Rex Air
bikes.description: Introducing T-Rex Air – the raddest wheels in town! It's not just an electric cycle; it's simply two-wheeled power. With a dash of dino-inspired flair and a whisper-quiet electric hum, T-Rex Air takes you on a journey where fun meets futuristic. Glide through the streets with the wind in your hair, and let the T-Rex Air bring a dash of daring to your everyday adventures. It's not just an electric cycle; it's a roar on wheels – get ready to pedal into the world with style and smiles!

specs.Brakes: Dual Mechanical Disk Brakes with auto cut off
specs.Range: Up to 40km on Throttle | Up to 50km on PAS

bikes.card_description: Move beyond movement and feel like flying on every journey with this mean machine.

bikes.name: T-Rex+ V3
bikes.description: With T-Rex+ bring out your A game in travel, whether you are climbing up or crisscrossing the streets next to your home.

specs.Brakes: Mechanical disc brakes with auto cut off
specs.Front Wheel: Aluminium Alloy, 36H Hub with Quick Release
specs.Light: Front and Rear light with integrated horn
specs.Range: Up to 40 Km on Throttle | Up to 50 Km on PAS

bikes.card_description: Beast of all terrains. Made to push boundaries while promising comfort out of the comfort zone.

bikes.name: Legend 07 MSD Edition
bikes.description: It's not just any electric cycle; it's an X1 that laughs at rough terrain and says, "Is that all you've got, gravel?" This electric cycle is so tough; it's like a Transformer that turns from city slicker to off-road adventurer in the blink of an eye.

specs.Front Fork: Front Fork Suspension with 100 mm Travel
specs.Brakes: Mechanical Disc Brakes with Auto Cut-off
specs.Range: Upto 35 KM on PAS | 30 Km on Throttle

bikes.card_description: Adventure perfect partner to make all your journeys and stories epic.

bikes.name: ST-X
bikes.description: ST-X is the ultimate city bike, with a sleek design that slices through traffic and a battery that lasts all day. The Nylon tyres are the secret weapon, gliding through potholes and rough roads like a pro. With its powerful motor and smooth suspension, ST-X is the perfect ride for city dwellers who refuse to be slowed down. It's not just an e-cycle; it's a statement, a declaration of independence from traffic jams and parking headaches.
bikes.card_description: Fuel your passion for adventure and cut through traffic with the sleek, all-day electric city bike.

bikes.name: X2
bikes.description: Introducing X2, the ultimate electric cycle for all you thrill-seeking, city-hopping, and adventure-loving folks! With its super snazzy frame and a 250w rear hub motor, it's the turbo boost your ride's been craving! Time to zip, zap, and zoom!

specs.Front Fork: Front Fork Suspension with 100 mm Travel
specs.Brakes: Mechanical Disc Brakes with Auto Cut-off
specs.Range: Up to 35 Km on PAS | Up to 30 Km on Throttle

bikes.card_description: Dream ebike is now real. So comfort and chic, makes every ride seem like the best trip.

bikes.name: X1
bikes.description: It's not just any electric cycle; it's an X1 that laughs at rough terrain and says, "Is that all you've got, gravel?" This electric cycle is so tough; it's like a Transformer that turns from city slicker to off-road adventurer in the blink of an eye.

specs.Front Fork: Front Fork Suspension with 100 mm Travel
specs.Brakes: Mechanical Disc Brakes with Auto Cut-off

bikes.card_description: Adventure perfect partner to make all your journeys and stories epic.

bikes.name: Ranger
bikes.description: Ranger is more than just an e-cycle; it’s the ultimate companion for your adventures as well as daily commutes! Powered by a 250w motor, it hits speeds up to 25 km/hr, while the 48V 12.75 Ah Li-Ion removable battery gives you a range of up to 75 km on PAS. Its 20" x 4.0" Nylon tyres conquer any terrain, and the front suspension fork ensures a smooth ride. With 5 levels of pedal assist, a bright LCD display, and mechanical disc brakes for ultimate control, the Ranger is built for thrill-seekers and city cruisers alike.

specs.Brakes: Mechanical disc brakes with auto cut off
specs.Light: Front and Rear Light with Integrated horn
specs.Range: Upto 75 KM on PAS | Upto 60 KM on Throttle

bikes.card_description: The ultimate companion for your adventures as well as daily commutes!

bikes.name: X3
bikes.description: Introducing the zippy X3. With its unique mojo, puncture-resistant tires, and a snazzy 250W rear motor, this wild electric cycle rules the concrete jungle and off-road terrain.

specs.Front Fork: Front Fork Suspension with 60 mm Travel
specs.Brakes: Mechanical Disc Brakes with Auto Cut-off
specs.Battery: 36V 7.0Ah Li-Ion Frame Integrated Battery with Panasonic Cells
specs.Range: Up to 40 KM on PAS | Up to 30 Km on Throttle

bikes.card_description: Gravel or smooth, you groove on every road. Elegant and energetic on all rides, day to night.

bikes.name: Dope
bikes.description: The Dope is more than just a kids’ cycle, it’s their first taste of the electric ride revolution! With a high tensile steel frame, 24” tyres, and a safe yet thrilling 250W motor, it balances excitement with security. A removable 5.2Ah battery, V-brakes with auto cut-off, suspension fork, and integrated display make it the most complete e-bike for kids aged 8–12.

specs.Frame: High Tensile Steel Frame | Frame Size: 14”
specs.Range: Up to 22 km on PAS | Up to 20 km on Throttle

bikes.card_description: The Dope Kids E-Bike is designed to bring safe, fun, and exciting rides for young champions.

bikes.name: T-Rex Smart
bikes.description: Meet your all-rounder e-cycle, equipped with a 250W rear hub motor and 36V 12.75Ah removable battery that powers your commute up to 50 km on PAS and 40 km on Throttle. With 3 riding modes and a high-tensile steel frame, the T-Rex Smart Bluetooth is the perfect balance of muscle and smart tech. Connected via the Amiigo NXT App, you get access to safety controls, service alerts, ride stats, and a growing rider community - right from your phone.

specs.Tyre: 29" x 2.4" Puncture Protection upto 5mm Nylon tyres
specs.Brakes: Mechanical Disc Brakes with Auto Cut-off
specs.Range: Up to 50 KM on PAS | Up to 40 Km on Throttle
specs.Side Mirror: Rear View Bar End Side Mirrors

bikes.card_description: With 3 riding modes and a high-tensile steel frame, the T-Rex Smart Bluetooth is the perfect balance of muscle and smart tech.
